  • Method Details

    • bookFlat

      public boolean bookFlat(String applicationId, String officerId, String flatType)
      Books a flat for a successful application and updates remaining units.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - ID of the successful application
      officerId - NRIC of the handling officer
      flatType - The flat type being booked
      Returns:
      true if booking succeeded, false otherwise

    • generateFlatSelectionReceipt

      public String generateFlatSelectionReceipt(String applicationId, String projectName, String flatType)
      Generates a formatted receipt for a flat selection based on the application details.

      The receipt includes the applicant's ID, application ID, project name, selected flat type, and the current booking date and time.

      Parameters:
      applicationId - the unique identifier of the application
      projectName - the name of the project for which the flat is booked
      flatType - the type of flat selected by the applicant
      Returns:
      a formatted string representing the flat selection receipt
